title: Pentakill Mordekaiser NEEDS more „Metal“ in his Skin!

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Pentakill Mordekaiser with ingame gameplay! Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): https://amzn.to/2qZ3Bmv Skin name is CONFIRMED as Pentakill Mordekaiser, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle.

body:
By the love of all Metal gods, please give him more „smash the Guitar“ feeling.
Dont know if they make more but please something like a moshpit for his ult with Songs of the pentakill and some unique vfx Sounds would be needed for one of the Most iconic skins in League of Legends!

And this crappy reused infernal Skin effects are more disappointing than seeing Born of Osiris live.

replies.body: Welp, this is disappointing. He lost all his coolness :(.
Also while I love the new mace I would def prefer the guitar back idk about what others think of this i know its in his dance but im going to miss hitting people with a sharp guitar

Needs more Guitars SF at the very least. One on the Q smash. Some Shredding during the W or Ulti.

As a metal fan I support upping this skins cool factor.
The true question I want answered is if his dance will scale with attack speed like Master Yi does.  This must be known!

I hope that this isn't the final product for Pentakill Mord, because it's basically Infernal Mord but with the Pentakill skin. Give us a mid-performance Ultimate, guitar licks to rebuke the gods themselves, a true composition of death and destruction.
Please let him hit Perople with the Guitar, there is no reason, why he should have a maze with this skin
